localString.value: The drow are an evil subrace of elves, living deep underground in the dangerous Underdark.

Forge using Black ingots, Drow chain mail is imbued with magical properties fitting for the dark race.
Forge using Black ingots, Drow chain mail is imbued with magical properties fitting for the dark race.
This magic armor grants additional protection to its wearer, but it doesn't bear the hallmarks of any specific maker.
This magic weapon has an enhancement bonus to attack and damage, but it doesn't bear the hallmarks of any specific maker.
This magic shield grants additional protection to its wearer, but it doesn't bear the hallmarks of any specific maker.

Made from a fine silk, this robe seems to have a permanent aura of light around it.
This knife-like tool is used for tinkering.
Essence of Acid for making Acid Arrows and Bolts.
Essence of Cold for making Frozen Arrows and Bolts.
Essence of Electricity for making Electrical Arrows and Bolts.
Essence of Fire for making Flaming Arrows and Bolts.

The young tinkerer has many interesting devices that they can build, along with their base wires, widgets and gears. Some of these devices are even useful!
Gnomish Fire Stick - Using the drawing below, construct an enclosure for the Flaming Alchemy pack using 2 copper wires. Be certain to not build this device around an open flame.
Tinkered Mining Helmet - Protects and is functional! Using a crafted copper open helmet as a base, attach an Electrical Alchemy pack. Use 2 copper wires for controlling the device, as indicated...traditionally, the light is activated with a chin switch.
Gnomish Stun Rod - Useful for temporarily disabling brigands that you may meet on the road. Using the widget for the body of the device, carefully attach the Electrical Alchemy pack with 2 copper control wires. DO NOT POINT THE DEVICE AT YOURSELF DURING CONSTRUCTION. Doing so may lead to injury.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of tinstone ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of tinstone ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of myrkandite ore.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of blue syenite.
A large, solid ore vein juts out from the ground. This one seems to contain traces of gold ore.

The grease covered contraption before you contains the necessary tools, clamps, cutter, vials and other assorted bits needed to use the tinkering skill. A tinkerer tool is needed to activate and use parts of the set.
